about_the_game:
Embark on a journey in a vibrant world full of magic and mystery.

Whether you're battling fierce monsters, forming lasting friendships, or just exploring the beautiful landscapes, [ASDA STORY] has something for everyone.

Join us today and be part of a community where every adventure is just the beginning of a new story!

----------------------------------------------------

Fishing & Digging!

Gather crafting materials and special items by fishing or digging! Complete fishing books by catching all the fish on a continent to receive rewards!


Eight Playable Classes!

From tank roles to healers, buffers, and various damage dealers, you’re sure to find a class that fits your play style!

Choose from one-hand sword, two-hand sword, spear, crossbow, bow, attack mage, support mage, or healing mage!

Find Your Soulmate!

Become soulmates with another player and grow even stronger together! Level up together and gain exclusive skills unique to soulmates, such as the ability to teleport to, summon, heal, and revive each other! Other skills will increase your strength as you play together and prevent the loss of experience upon death. Kill 100 monsters together to earn a Golden Apple, which grants extra experience and items!

Guilds, With Benefits!

Create or join a guild and work together to earn great rewards! Gather guild points from various activities, such as killing monsters, questing, digging, fishing, crafting, gaining titles, and more. Donate these points to your guild to help it level up, allowing your guild to grow larger and unlocking access to guild buffs that increase your power, speed, and experience!

Achievements Galore!

Love game achievements? Asda Story's title system contains over 200 titles to collect and show off! Perform certain actions to discover and gain titles, then display them above your character for all to see. Collect the most titles to compete for the top 100 ranking and earn extra stat points for the top 1000!

Show Off Your Style!

Choose from hundreds of costume to express your personality! Avatars can be worn to change the appearance of your equipment without sacrificing stats. Mix and match hats, shirts, pants, gloves, shoes, and accessories to create your own unique fashion! Additionally, boost your stats further with the rune socketing system, similar to the sowel system!

Be Unique!

With over 90,000 hair and face combinations, you don’t have to be a clone! Choose from 35 hairstyles with 24 colors each to make your character stand out. There are also 21 face styles with 6 eye colors each, offering various looks from cute or seductive to serious or spaced out! Create a character that reflects your personality!

Lovable Pets!

Collect dozens of pets to accompany you on your adventure! Each pet will boost your character’s stats while by your side. Level them up and evolve them for even higher stat bonuses, or gather them just for fun!

We look forward to seeing everyone in the game :)

name: ASDA STORY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce FX5200
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 8600GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

short_description: Enjoy adorable characters and diverse content! Dive into the best casual MMORPG for free with [ASDA STORY], Start your adventure now!
